sentence.Network_en: The turning point in the process of growing up is when you discover the core of strength within you that survives all hurt.
sentence.Network_cn: 当你从内心深处找到一种可以忍受一切痛苦的坚强力量时，你的成长历程就会出现飞跃。

sentence.Network_en: We found a cyst and I suctioned off the liquid within.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们发现了一个囊肿，我把其中的液体吸了出来。

sentence.Network_en: Any property which does not sell within six weeks is overpriced.
sentence.Network_cn: 任何房产如果6周内还卖不出去就说明定价过高。

显然，团结经济是一个公开的、有争议的思想及实践的世界：在享有共同价值的空间背景下，团结经济网络内部（within）的争论和分歧是存在的，也是正常的。事实上情况可能是这样：对于（for）团结经济来说，最大的对立是如何.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Old English withinnan 'on the inside'

entry.def: If something is within a place, area, or object, it is inside it or surrounded by it.

example.ex: Clients are entertained within private dining rooms...
example.tran: 在私人餐室内款待客户。

example.ex: An olive-coloured tent stood within a thicket of trees.
example.tran: 一顶橄榄色帐篷扎在树丛当中。

entry.tran: 在(社会、组织或体系)中(发生或存在)
entry.def: Something that happens or exists within a society, organization, or system, happens or exists inside it.

example.ex: The motives that attract people to work within a social service are variable.
example.tran: 吸引人们到社会福利部门工作的动机各不相同。

example.ex: ...the spirit of self-sacrifice within an army...
example.tran: 军队中的自我牺牲精神

entry.def: If you experience a particular feeling, you can say that it is within you.

example.ex: He's coping much better within himself...
You've got to identify these inadequacies within yourself.
example.tran: 你必须认识到自身的这些不足。

entry.tran: 在(某种限度或规则)之内
entry.def: If something is within a particular limit or set of rules, it does not go beyond it or is not more than what is allowed.

example.ex: Troops have agreed to stay within specific boundaries to avoid confrontations...
example.tran: 军队同意驻扎在特定地界内，以避免冲突。

entry.tran: 在(某一距离)之内;不超出(某一距离)
entry.def: If you are within a particular distance of a place, you are less than that distance from it.

example.ex: The man was within a few feet of him...
example.tran: 这个男子离他只有几英尺。

example.ex: It was within easy walking distance of the hotel...

entry.tran: 在(某段时间)内;不超出(某段时间)
entry.def: Within a particular length of time means before that length of time has passed.

example.ex: About 40% of all students entering as freshmen graduate within 4 years...
example.tran: 所有入学新生中约有40%在4年内毕业。

example.ex: Within 24 hours the deal was completed.

entry.def: If something is within sight ,within earshot, or within reach, you can see it, hear it, or reach it.

example.ex: His twenty-five-foot boat was moored within sight of West Church.
example.tran: 他那条25英尺长的小船停泊在看得见西教堂的地方。

example.ex: ...her heels clicking on the tiled floor, probably an irritating noise to other people within earshot...
example.tran: 她的鞋跟踩在瓷砖地板上咯噔咯噔响，这声音可能会让听见的人觉得心烦

Sentence.sentence: Some scientistsmaintain that the changes we are seeing fall within the range of random (无规律的) variation—some years are cold, others warm, and we have just had an unremarkable string of warm yearsrecently—but that is becoming an increasingly rare interpretation in the face of continued and increasing warm conditions.
Such books, which only rarely end up in permanent collections, either private or public, will probably only be available as e-books within a few years
million people who wanted and were available for work hadn't looked within the last four weeks and were no longer even classified as unemployed.
Ebola was so deadly and killed so quickly that within a short period of time, there was no one around to infect.
I finally found a really nice apartment that's within my price range
The houses within his price range are sold out.

means.word_mean: (表示位置)在…里面, 在…内部

sentences.en: There are two long rivers within the continent.
He has grown three inches within the last two years.
sentences.cn: 这两年的工夫他长高了三英寸。

sentences.en: Mr.Smith lives within ten miles of us.
sentences.cn: 史密斯先生住在离我们不到十英里远的地方。

sentences.en: It is within our power to reward him for that.
sentences.cn: 我们有权为那件事奖励他。

sentences.en: There are serious differences of opinion within the medical profession.
sentences.cn: 在医务界存在着严重的意见分歧。

jushi.english: It built up a state of tension within themselves.
jushi.chinese: 那使他们心里十分紧张。

jushi.english: Mr.Smith lives within ten miles of us.
jushi.chinese: 史密斯先生住在离我们不到十英里远的地方。

jushi.english: He is keeping within a few yards of his sister's chair.
jushi.chinese: 他同他姐姐的椅子保持两三码的距离。
